GSD36nars2_iu:310: ājñā lekhaḥ paṭṭakaḥ śāsanaṃ vā Nar_M2.38a
GSD36nars2_iu:315: ātmārthe kiṃ na kuryāt sa Nar_1.207c
GSD36nars2_iu:323: ādhiḥ pattraṃ vikrayo vā krayo vā Nar_M2.38b
GSD36nars2_iu:469: ṛṇī na syād yathā pitā Nar_13.32d
GSD36nars2_iu:568: kaścic cet pravrajet tu vā Nar_13.24b
GSD36nars2_iu:586: kāmāt krodhāc ca lobhāc ca Nar_M1.21a
GSD36nars2_iu:667: kṛtaṃ vā yad ṛṇaṃ kṛcchre Nar_1.09c
GSD36nars2_iu:707: krītaṃ paṇyaṃ ca yaḥ krayī Nar_8.9b
GSD36nars2_iu:861: cakṣur nāsā ca karṇau ca Nar_19.44c
GSD36nars2_iu:901: cīṛṇāḥ pītāś ca tā gopaḥ Nar_6.12c
GSD36nars2_iu:1001: tatra karma ca yat kuryād Nar_5.18c
GSD36nars2_iu:1036: tathā hy āyur na hīyate Nar_18.52d
GSD36nars2_iu:1067: tad ādau tu likhet sarvaṃ Nar_M2.18c
GSD36nars2_iu:1128: tasmād deśe ca kāle ca Nar_8.12a
GSD36nars2_iu:1134: tasminn evaṃ kṛte sā cet Nar_20.11c
GSD36nars2_iu:1142: tasya te yasya tā gāvo Nar_12.57c
GSD36nars2_iu:1145: tasya yo na dadāti tām Nar_12.26d
GSD36nars2_iu:1155: tasyām eva tu yo vṛttau Nar_1.56a
GSD36nars2_iu:1160: taṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā svato mārgāt Nar_18.6c
GSD36nars2_iu:1201: te cen na dadyus tāṃ bhartre Nar_12.25c
GSD36nars2_iu:1211: tebhya eva na sākṣī syād Nar_1.136c
GSD36nars2_iu:1212: te yad brūyur asat sad vā Nar_18.19c
GSD36nars2_iu:1214: teṣām api na bālaḥ syān Nar_1.172a
GSD36nars2_iu:1225: teṣāṃ sa eva dharmaḥ syāt Nar_13.15c
GSD36nars2_iu:1233: tair eva prahito na cet Nar_1516.31d
GSD36nars2_iu:1306: daṇḍyaḥ sa pāpo vadhyaś ca Nar_18.10c
GSD36nars2_iu:1307: daṇḍyaḥ sa rājñā dāpyaś ca Nar_2.04c
GSD36nars2_iu:1315: dattva rṇaṃ paitṛkaṃ ca yat Nar_13.32b
GSD36nars2_iu:1336: darpād vā yadi vā mohāc Nar_12.67a
GSD36nars2_iu:1363: dāpyo yat tatra naṣṭaṃ syād Nar_6.10c
GSD36nars2_iu:1378: dāsaḥ putraś ca tau samau Nar_1.26d
GSD36nars2_iu:1450: doṣe tu sati nāgaḥ syād Nar_12.31c
GSD36nars2_iu:1502: dviḥ pādas tris tribhāgas tu Nar_9.8c
GSD36nars2_iu:1507: dve same tv itarā vaset Nar_12.99d
GSD36nars2_iu:1546: dharmaś cārthaś ca kīrtiś ca Nar_M1.27a
GSD36nars2_iu:1583: na ca bījaṃ vināsti tat Nar_12.59b
GSD36nars2_iu:1591: na cet tena tad āhṛtam Nar_13.11d
GSD36nars2_iu:1592: na cet so 'nyatra tan nayet Nar_14.22d
GSD36nars2_iu:1595: na ced vāṇijyam asya tat Nar_18.36d
GSD36nars2_iu:1609: na tat satyaṃ yac chalenānuviddham Nar_M3.17d
GSD36nars2_iu:1632: na dṛṣṭaṃ yac ca pūrveṣu Nar_18.4c
GSD36nars2_iu:1635: na dviṣo na ca nāstikāt Nar_18.38b
GSD36nars2_iu:1654: na bhidyād yāṃ ca sūkaraḥ Nar_11.36d
GSD36nars2_iu:1699: na sa tal labdhum arhati Nar_1.70d
GSD36nars2_iu:1700: na sa taṃ prāpnuyāt kāmaṃ Nar_5.38c
GSD36nars2_iu:1704: na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhā Nar_M3.17a
GSD36nars2_iu:1708: na syāl lekhyaṃ na sākṣiṇaḥ Nar_1.214b
GSD36nars2_iu:1709: na hi jātu vinā daṇḍaṃ Nar_M1.58c
GSD36nars2_iu:1739: nāsau dharmo yatra na satyam asti Nar_M3.17c
GSD36nars2_iu:1803: naiko na strī na kūṭakṛt Nar_1.172b
GSD36nars2_iu:1806: naiva vṛddhir na ca kṣayaḥ Nar_9.15d
GSD36nars2_iu:1994: pure ca rāṣṭre nigṛhṇīyāt pāpān Nar_19.69d
GSD36nars2_iu:2033: pṛthag gaṇāṃś ca ye bhindyus Nar_10.6a
GSD36nars2_iu:2180: prāptaś ca vivaden na yaḥ Nar_M1.53b
GSD36nars2_iu:2288: bhakṣair vā yadi vā bhojyair Nar_12.66a
GSD36nars2_iu:2293: bhayād vā pātayate yas tv Nar_20.21a
GSD36nars2_iu:2368: bhraṣṭaṃ tu duḥsthitaṃ yat syāj Nar_M2.14a
GSD36nars2_iu:2377: bhrātrā vā yad ṛṇaṃ kṛtam Nar_1.03b
GSD36nars2_iu:2413: mahān bhavati vā na vā Nar_8.11d
GSD36nars2_iu:2504: yaj janma sa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ Nar_12.103b
GSD36nars2_iu:2544: yadā ca na syur jñātāraḥ Nar_11.11a
GSD36nars2_iu:2545: yadā tu na svakulyāḥ syur Nar_1.100a
GSD36nars2_iu:2546: yadā tu naiva kaścit syāt Nar_12.22a
GSD36nars2_iu:2553: yadi deśe ca kāle ca Nar_6.18c
GSD36nars2_iu:2554: yadi na syāt pathaś cyutaḥ Nar_18.13d
GSD36nars2_iu:2572: yan na bhuktaṃ na tat sthiram Nar_1.68d
GSD36nars2_iu:2602: yasya te tasya tad dhanam Nar_5.39d
GSD36nars2_iu:2661: ye tu sabhyāḥ sabhāṃ gatvā Nar_M3.10a
GSD36nars2_iu:2663: yena yatra yathā ca yat Nar_1.01b
GSD36nars2_iu:2668: yeṣāṃ ca na kṛtāḥ pitrā Nar_13.33a
GSD36nars2_iu:2671: yo dharmaḥ karma yac caiṣām Nar_10.3a
GSD36nars2_iu:2672: yo na bhrātā na ca pitā Nar_M2.23a
GSD36nars2_iu:2687: yo hy etāṃ stenayed vācaṃ Nar_1.208c
GSD36nars2_iu:2738: rājña eva tu dāsaḥ syāt Nar_5.33a
GSD36nars2_iu:2754: rājñe kuryāt pūrvam āvedanaṃ yas Nar_M2.38c
GSD36nars2_iu:2875: vārttāṃ trayīṃ cāpy atha daṇḍanītim Nar_19.69a
GSD36nars2_iu:3015: vṛddhā na te ye na vadanti dharmam Nar_M3.17b
GSD36nars2_iu:3094: śaktāś cet sarva eva vā Nar_3.07d
GSD36nars2_iu:3158: śuddhiś ca teṣāṃ dharmād dhi Nar_M3.6c
GSD36nars2_iu:3224: śvo lekhanaṃ vā sa labhet Nar_M2.3a
GSD36nars2_iu:3315: sa phalaṃ pretya ceha ca Nar_1.45d
GSD36nars2_iu:3348: samāḥ śatrau ca mitre ca Nar_M3.4c
GSD36nars2_iu:3425: sa hy eṣāṃ vinayaḥ smṛtaḥ Nar_17.6d
GSD36nars2_iu:3581: stomaṃ dattvā vaset tu yaḥ Nar_6.22b
GSD36nars2_iu:3582: striyas tu na balāt kāryā Nar_20.28a
GSD36nars2_iu:3639: syus ta eva ca sākṣiṇaḥ Nar_17.4d
GSD36nars2_iu:3663: svam apy arthaṃ tathā naṣṭaṃ Nar_7.8a
GSD36nars2_iu:3678: svān bhāgān yadi dadyus te Nar_13.42a
